name: Ninjascape - Message of the victory
description: It was always hard to find anything bad to say about the Gamana games. They have the habit to create platforming challenge that leave a mark on any player that never fades with time. And yet the new followup, Ninjascape, Message of the victory, successfully builds on that distinctive gameplay in a way that doesn’t just retread the same ground. There’s more breadth, detail, choice, and diversity than ever, and it’s all done with engrossing color and light and an excellent, inspiring soundtrack. Once again the studio leaves us with a masterpiece that shows us there's still room for inovation in this media.
